document_data.name: Asham
document_data.mainbody: '''Asham''', who was also called '''Mad Asham''' by those who witnessed him wandering the streets babbling aimlessly, was an inhabitant of [[Qudra]] in [[north Zakhara]] in {{Yearlink|1367}}.{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: At one point Asham was a skilled [[sha'ir]]. He could usually be found on the streets of Qudra, grabbing strangers and warning them of the "whispering doom."
document_data.History: Asham was once a magical advisor to the [[Dauntless Mamluk Society]]. Long ago while on a raiding party with the Dauntless, Asham's group disappeared within the [[Haunted Lands]]. He remained missing for six years until one day he stumbled back into Qudra as a tattered mess. Asham's memories had be erased by unknown sources and no available magic, including that of skilled [[genie]]s using ''[[wish]]es'', was able to restore him.
